_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
• Parking reservations are required prior to 1pm, daily through Jan 4, 2026. Learn more about our Parking Program and Carpool Incentives.
  • Ikon Base Passes are not valid December 27 31. Its not too late to upgrade to from an Ikon Base Pass to full Ikon Pass with no blackout dates. Purchase online in My Account, call, or visit one of our ticket offices.
_inspectorSnowReport.AdditionalText: Use this field in Mtn Powder to display Digital Signage messages across the resort. 3rd party vendor can scrape "Additional Text" end-point from Mtn Powder web feed.
_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: Another 8" overnight at 8,000' for a 79" storm total. Terrain expands today at both base areas.
